name: The Memory of Eldur\u00eem
blurb: The Memory of Eldur\u00eem is an action-oriented, open world RPG.  Battle, collect loot, and explore the vast original fantasy world.

rewards.reward: No Reward

The Remembered of Eldur\u00eem\r\n==============================\r\nAs a supporter of The Memory of Eldur\u00eem you have our most sincere gratitude. Your name will be listed in the credits as someone who helped make everything possible.

Early Bird\r\n==============================\r\nYou will receive a copy of The Memory of Eldur\u00eem upon it's release along with free updates for as long as there are updates. This tier, and all tiers above this will also include an exclusive Kickstarter only in-game item.
Own The Game\r\n==============================\r\nYou will receive a Downloadable Copy of The Memory of Eldur\u00eem and an in-game item exclusive to Kickstarter supporters.

Early Bird Beta\r\n==============================\r\nYou will have access to the game during its beta stage of development. Months before official release you can download the game and participate in development through our online forums.

Beta Access\r\n==============================\r\nYou are smart, you want to be in on the action but not before all the major wrinkles and hiccups are taken care of. Months before release you will have access to the game to help us develop.

Early Bird Alpha\r\n==============================\r\nDon't wait for the game's release. Be a part of development. Very soon after our Kickstarter we will begin our interactive development. Be there to help shape The Memory of Eldur\u00eem.

Co-Op Pack.\r\n==============================\r\nGet two copies of The Memory of Eldur\u00eem upon release so you and a friend can play together. The full game will be released with multi-player support so it only makes sense to plan ahead.

Alpha Access\r\n==============================\r\nThis is where it's at. Cast off the chains of traditional video game development and get access to the game soon following our Kickstarter campaign and start helping us shape the future of The Memory of Eldur\u00eem. You will be a part of what features get implemented and in what order.

Armor of the Eldurii Kings\r\n==============================\r\nYou will be able to quest for an exclusive and highly elite set of Armor only available to this tier and above. This is your only chance to get this rare set of beautiful armor. This tier and all tiers above it have alpha access.

Co-Op Alpha.\r\n==============================\r\nGet alpha access for you and a friend so that the two of you can both have access to the developer forums and play together the second that Co-Op gets implemented. Plus if there are more of you who want this feature you can persuade us to implement it early.
The Badge of the Nirikoth\r\n==============================\r\nA unique quest item for our Kickstarters involving a very rare and terrifying creature is available for backers of this tier and above.

Essence of Eldur\u00eem\r\n==============================\r\nYou will have access to a particle effect on your hands that demonstrates your power. There will be other particle effects in the game but none will be so elite and so rare. This is only available to Kickstarters of this tier and above.

The Dwelling of the Ancients\r\n==============================\r\nThe ability to purchase an exclusive and very nice in-game home is only available to Kickstarters of this tier and above. Others will be filled with envy as you look down on them from within your majestic home.

The Conspect of Eternity\r\n==============================\r\nYou will have access to an exclusive in game book that contain troves of exclusive lore and art within its pages. Such knowledge is only available to Kickstarters of this tier and above.

Archean's Armorer\r\n==============================\r\nHelp us design a mighty and truly unique weapon for the world to see and quest for. You tell us what type of weapon it will be and help determine its appearance and attributes within the game.

A Shard of Truth\r\n==============================\r\nHelp us design a rune that will appear all over the game effectively immortalizing yourself within the Memory of Eldur\u00eem. You will work with our artists to make sure it is exactly as you wish it to be.

The Hand of Creation\r\n==============================\r\nHelp us design an NPC. He or she can look like you or not - he or she can be a treacherous villain or a virtuous saint. Work with writers and artists to add a part of yourself to the world.

Compatriot of The Void\r\n==============================\r\nHelp us create a faction. You can help decide the motives and the associated quest lines that go along with an entire group of people or creatures that the player will be able to ally him or herself with.

Eternity's Author\r\n==============================\r\nYou can work with our writers, our artists, and our development team to help create the idea for a town or city. Help name it and pick the architecture. Perhaps you have lore and associated quests or conflicts within your town. The possibilities are endless. Your word is the power of creation.

Eldur\u00eem's Inscription\r\n==============================\r\nYou will receive an extremely rare and very limited (5) boxed copy of The Memory of Eldur\u00eem. Each box will contain it's own unique art and will be signed by the development team.

The Sacrifice of Eldur\u00eem\r\n============================== \r\nYou will be the singular recipient of a physical blood shard. We will create a custom blood shard of your choice (No actual blood will be used in the process). Be the envy of everyone whoever plays The Memory of Eldur\u00eem
